author: henrib
msg: Added "compat" directory that contains Jexl-1.x compatible implementations of most common classes; this is intended to facilitate trivial upgrades to 2.0 (Jelly for instance). As of now, the compatibility jar is not built automatically (need to do some research on how to do this correctly).
As a result, the deprecated classes ({Script,Expression}Factory) have been moved to this package.

author: mconcini
msg: MYFACES-2434 - resolve problems with dummy request/response classes for system event listeners in a servlet 3.0 compliant runtime.
